# Rend Shadow Weave (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, M (a moonstone worth at least 50 gp)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. plus 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One 10-ft.-cube area of the Shadow Weave

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Champions of Valor (WotC)Â­, pg. 57

You damage the Shadow Weave, creating an area of dead magic that only affects the Shadow Weave rather than the Weave.

While you have this spell prepared, you get a +2 competence bonus on caster level checks to dispel Shadow Weave effects.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* This spell would also be effective against the Dark Duality.
